snippet.title: Unpetrified - Gameplay Trailer (March 2023)
snippet.description:
In this singleplayer narrative-driven adventure game, you take on the role of an adorable, curious Golem that explores a vibrant and lively world. This experience is entirely non-violent and contains no text or dialogues, offering a wholesome and relaxing story together with the Golem in this magical place.

Wishlist now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989720/Unpetrified__A_Dreamhunt_Story/

Join our Discord server for more content!
https://discord.com/invite/cPMPUnHta6

https://www.unpetrifiedgame.com
https://www.dreamhunt.com
https://twitter.com/dreamhunt_
https://instagram.com/dreamhunt_studio
https://tiktok.com/@dreamhuntstudio_
https://www.facebook.com/dreamhuntstudio 

#Adventure #Exploration #Singleplayer #Atmospheric #Casual #Relaxing #games #gameplay
